DOC.brief_summary: A ONE YEAR SAFETY STUDY FOR PATIENTS WHO COMPLETE STUDY VAA489A2307 .
DOC.brief_title: A Year Long Study Evaluate Safety Combination Valsartan ( 320 mg ) Amlodipine ( 5 mg ) Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF VAA489A2307 CORE TRIAL VISIT 7 BLOOD PRESSURE MUST BE MSDBP ≤ 95 mmHg AND MSSBP ≤ 150 mmHg PATIENTS WHO EXPERIENCED ANY ADVERSE EVENTS CONSIDERED SERIOUS AND DRUG RELATED IN VAA489A2307 CORE Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
